attributes.action: Create a large scale facility for manufacturing Corona Virus vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: This is fundamentally in the interest of the health of the UK population and the good of our economy.
attributes.background: Oxford University is expected to have fully tested a Covid 19 vaccine which could be ready by September 2020 for mass production. The UK government should already be sanctioning/funding a facility large enough for vaccination of the UK wide population. the facility should be ready by September 2020

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has announced funding for facilities to mass produce vaccines, including a potential Covid-19 vaccine.

This includes "a rapid deployment facility to begin manufacturing at scale from Summer 2020".

You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/vaccines-manufacturing-and-innovation-centre-to-open-12-months-ahead-of-schedule

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
